description: A turn-based tactical MMO, developed in C# for the server and Unity for the client.

paragraphs: This turn-based tactical MMO combines strategic depth with multiplayer engagement. Built with a robust C# server architecture and a sleek Unity client, it delivers smooth gameplay and real-time interactions.
The game features a comprehensive combat system, character progression, and social features. Players can form alliances, engage in tactical battles, and explore a rich fantasy world together.
